text: Therefore the Lord Himself will give you a sign: Behold, the virgin 7:14 Or young woman will be with child and will give birth to a son, and will call Him Immanuel.7:14 Immanuel means God with us; literally and she will call His name Immanuel; DSS and His name will be called Immanuel or and he will call His name Immanuel; LXX you will call His name Immanuel; cited in Matthew 1:23.
